ru.nordavind.ecgdonglelib

Interface IECGDongleServiceWrapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceWrapper

    public interface IECGDongleServiceWrapper
    interface for ECG Dongle service wrapper

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnConnectedToServiceListener
      listener to be called when connected to the service
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnDeviceConnectedListener
      listener to be called when a device is connected
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnDeviceDisconnectedListener
      listener to be called when a device is disconnected
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnDisconnectedFromServiceListener
      listener to be called when disconnected from ECG Dongle Framework service.
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnFailedToStartScanListener
      listener to be called when we failed to start scan
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnGotDevicesListener
      listener to be called when we get a list of connected devices (after connecting to service or after calling queryForDevices()
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnNextDataReplyListener
      listener to be called when we've got next chunk of data from ECG Dongle Framework
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnScanFiltersUpdatedListener
      listener to be called when scan filters changed
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnScanStartedListener
      listener to be called when a scan is started
      static interface  IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnScanStoppedListener
      listener to be called when scan stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        true if connected to ECG Dongle Framework service

      • getProtoVersion

        int getProtoVersion()
        Returns:
        protocol version

      • init

        @UiThread
boolean init(android.content.Context context)
        Call this method to bind ServiceWrapper to ECG Dongle Framework service. IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnConnectedToServiceListener is called when ServiceWrapper connected to ECG Dongle Framework service. Then ECG Dongle Framework service sends list of currently connected ECG Dongle devices and IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnGotDevicesListener is called.
        Parameters:
        context -

      • isServiceAppInstalled

        boolean isServiceAppInstalled(android.content.Context context)
        Returns:
        true if ECG Dongle Framework application installed

      • getGooglePlayServiceAppUri

        android.net.Uri getGooglePlayServiceAppUri()
        Returns:
        URI of ECG Dongle Service app in Google play Open the Uri: Uri uri = getGooglePlayServiceAppUri(); Intent intent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_VIEW, uri); context.startActivity(intent);

      • release

        @UiThread
void release()
        call do release ECG Dongle Framework service connection IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnDisconnectedFromServiceListener.onDisconnectedFromService() callback is called after disconnecting from ECG Dongle Framework service.

      • queryForDevices

        boolean queryForDevices()
        query for connected devices
        Returns:
        true if request was sent to service IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnGotDevicesListener.onGotDevices(List) callback is called un UI thread after ECG Dongle Framework returns a list of connected ECG Dongle devices

      • startScan

        boolean startScan(ECGDongleDevice device,
                  FilterSettings filterSettings)
        start scanning with specified device
        Parameters:
        device - Device to start scan with
        filterSettings - Filter settings to be used for scanning
        Returns:
        true if request was sent to service IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnConnectedToServiceListener.onConnectedToService(int, int, int, String, int) callback is called after successful ECG Dongle scan start. If ECG Dongle Framework fails to start scan, IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnFailedToStartScanListener.onFailedToStartScan(ECGDongleDevice, int, int) callback is called on UI thread use FailedToStartScanReason and DongleStopReason to determine/report, why ECG Dongle Framework service failed to start scan. Note: if failedToStartReason == FailedToStartScanReason.DEVICE_STOPPED and stopReason == DongleStopReason.SHOULD_RECONNECT_DEVICE, please, ask user to reconnect the ECG Dongle device. It might be required to reconnect ECG Dongle up to 3 times on some rare Android devices.

      • setFilters

        boolean setFilters(FilterSettings filterSettings)
        sets filters for current scan does nothing if no scan running
        Parameters:
        filterSettings - filter settings
        Returns:
        true if request was sent to service IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnScanFiltersUpdatedListener.onScanFiltersUpdated(ScanFilterInfo, ScanConfig) callback is called after filters actually changed

      • stopCurrentScan

        boolean stopCurrentScan()
        stops current scan does nothing if no scan running
        Returns:
        true if request was sent to service IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnScanStoppedListener.onScanStopped(ECGDongleDevice, ScanConfig, int) callback is called after scan actually stopped.

      • setOnGotDevicesListener

        IECGDongleServiceWrapper setOnGotDevicesListener(IECGDongleServiceWrapper.OnGotDevicesListener onGotDevicesListener)
